Desc.entry: A social group which organises activities around learning Ghanaian languages for children, teenagers and families so that they can keep in contact with their roots and communicate with their grandparents. Aims to foster self-esteem and responsible behaviour amongst young people within the community.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Monthly, times change, please contact for details

Telephone.entry: Monthly, times change, please contact for details

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Monthly, times change, please contact for details

category.entry: BLACK AND MINORITY ETHNIC PEOPLE - COMMUNITY ORGANISATIONS
